name: Leviathan Down
description:
Leviathan Down is a steam-punk inspired platformer game. It is filled with profound narratives and puzzles to solve.

"Above Earth’s destroyed surface flies “Her Majesty’s W.H.A.L.E.”, a ship upon which noble class are safe from harm and wrapped in frivolity. The Wards are a noble family that stands out among their peers; they are known to be fierce advocates for those-who-live-Below.

As the winter months grow nearer and mortality rates spike on the surface, Lady Ysabell Ward intends to present a revolutionary project to the Queen meant to integrate those-who-live-Below into the aerial society. The noble class promptly accuses Lady Ward of treason and the plans she made are lost. Lady Ward and her husband are imprisoned, and their son, Bentley, is sent Below. He enlists the help of his mother’s friend, Sasha, to sneak aboard the ship and find a copy of his Mother’s Plans to finally present to the Queen. However, all is not as it seems."

Developed with Team WhipIt in GSU Aurora Game Development Club (2019-2020)
